name: azure-cosmos-db
label: Azure Cosmos DB
description: Azure Cosmos DB is a globally distributed, multi-model database service offered by Microsoft. It is designed to provide high availability, scalability, and low-latency access to data for modern applications.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Azure Cosmos DB server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Master Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: The master key for the Azure Cosmos DB server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Database Name
fields.name: database_name
fields.description: The database name for the Azure Cosmos DB server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Insert Document
operations.description: The Create Document operation creates a new document in a collection.

parameters.title: Document Details
parameters.name: document_details
parameters.description: Specify the document details which you want to add in Azure Cosmos DB. For example: {"id":"id1","name":"Jay1", "age":20}.

parameters.title: Container Name
parameters.name: collection_name
parameters.description: The container name for the Azure Cosmos DB server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

parameters.title: Database Name
parameters.name: database_name
parameters.tooltip: If database name left here blank, the value provided at the time of configuration will be used.
parameters.description: The database name for the Azure Cosmos DB server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

operations.title: Query Document

parameters.name: query
